title: Roasted courgettes with tomatoes and garlic
ingredients: ['2 courgettes, cut in half lengthwise, then sliced into moons', '350g ripe tomatoes, quartered', '1/2 onion, minced', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1/2 teaspoon dried red chilli flakes', '4 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt and pepper to taste', '40g grated Parmesan cheese', '1 tablespoon freshly chopped basil']
